name: Hop'n'roll
description:
How high will your penguin go? Tap the screen to hop and roll as much as you can!

Unleash the potential of these brave tiny wings — choose your character, beat your own high score and achieve crazy challenges!

Tap to take off and let the flappy fun begin!


Privacy Policy: http://severex.io/app/hopnroll/privacy/
Terms of Use: http://severex.io/terms/

We hope you enjoy playing this classic arcade game!
If you have any questions or suggestions, do not hesitate to contact us.
